ATTRACTIONS.TITLE: Tourist Attractions
ATTRACTIONS.DESCRIPTION: Discover the famous and fascinating attractions in Ho Chi Minh City.

BEN_THANH.NAME: Ben Thanh Market
BEN_THANH.DESC: An iconic Saigon market where you can find everything from souvenirs to local cuisine, experience the vibrant atmosphere and rich history of the city.

NOTRE_DAME.NAME: Notre-Dame Cathedral
NOTRE_DAME.DESC: A magnificent Gothic architecture built during the French colonial period, this iconic cathedral stands as a testament to the city's diverse cultural heritage.

WAR_MUSEUM.NAME: War Remnants Museum
WAR_MUSEUM.DESC: A powerful museum displaying artifacts and images from the war, offering visitors a profound understanding of Vietnam's history and the impact of conflict.

INDEPENDENCE_PALACE.NAME: Independence Palace
INDEPENDENCE_PALACE.DESC: A historic landmark that served as the residence and workplace of the President of South Vietnam, featuring impressive architecture and significant historical importance.

TIPS.TITLE: Travel Tips
TIPS.DESCRIPTION: Essential tips for exploring Ho Chi Minh City

CULTURE.TITLE: Local Culture
CULTURE.DESCRIPTION: Discover the rich culture of Ho Chi Minh City
